attributes.action: look less harshly upon those found guilty of treason against the state and/or the crown.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to society's evermore disillusioned members. Treason levels are at an all time high. And with the archaic punishments that have been the standard for the past two centuries, various unlucky individuals have found themselves on the wrong end of a forty year stretch. This is not but ridiculous and I emplore you to make a stand with me. For christ's sake I could be put in jail just for making this petition.

Regards, A Concerned Vigilante

rejection.details: Please rephrase your petition as it is not clear what action you are requesting the government take.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
